title: [Bug]: Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core 17.11.4 NuGet package is broken
body:
### Issue Description

Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core 17.11.4 NuGet package depends on Microsoft.NET.StringTools 17.11.4 that does not exist.

### Steps to Reproduce

Create a project and add a reference to Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core 17.11.4 NuGet package.

### Expected Behavior

Build should succeed.

### Actual Behavior

Build fails.

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_
